ygData.subject: Re: Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You have a basic understanding of every class.  There s no way you can have the kind of intimate understanding that comes from having played and died over
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 5 Oct 1999, Naeeldar wrote:
>
> The thing is that people who are really decked out pretty much understand
> the ins and outs of every game. As the've got a char that is 40+ maybe a
> little less. By then you basically have a good understanding of every class
> and their limits and so forth.

You have a basic understanding of every class. There's no way
you can have the kind of intimate understanding that comes
from having played and died over and over. Heck, most of the
people I meet don't even know what songs/spells the other
classes have aside from the most commonly used ones. The only
people I've seen with a good understanding of (most) every
class and their limits and so forth are the ones who've
somehow had enough time to get four or five diverse characters
past the mid 20s or so.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
